meanings.definition: An act of placing something in a specific location.
meanings.sent1: She made several postings on the bulletin board.
meanings.sent2: The postings of flyers around town helped spread the word.
meanings.sent3: His excessive postings of sticky notes on the fridge annoyed his roommates.
meanings.sent4: The postings of colorful flags marked the path to the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The postings of signs along the trail guided hikers to the summit.

meanings.definition: A written message or announcement displayed in a public place.
meanings.sent1: The postings on the community board informed residents about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent2: She read the postings on the wall while waiting for her bus.
meanings.sent3: The postings on the tree made it look like a message-bearing plant.
meanings.sent4: The postings on the door warned visitors of the security system.
meanings.sent5: The postings on the window caught the attention of passersby.

meanings.definition: The act of submitting something for consideration or publication.
meanings.sent1: His postings of articles to the magazine were well-received.
meanings.sent2: The online postings of job applications increased the company's candidate pool.
meanings.sent3: The postings of his artwork to the gallery were met with praise.
meanings.sent4: Her postings of poems to the literary journal showcased her talent.
meanings.sent5: The postings of research papers to the academic journal added to the scholarly discourse.
